name: Isle Royale - Feldtmann Loop
notes: Remote, no cell service. Wolves and moose. The kind of trip that makes you feel alive.

name: BWCA - Boundary Waters
notes: Paddling and portaging through the north woods.

name: Torres del Paine - W Trek
notes: Patagonian wind, glaciers, and granite towers. One of the world's great treks.

name: Zion - West Rim Trail
notes: Top-down views of the canyon. Solitude above the crowds.

name: Zion - Angel's Landing
notes: Chains, exposure, and a view that earns every drop of sweat.

name: Glacier - Highline Trail
notes: Walking the continental divide. Mountain goats and wildflowers.

name: Glacier - Grinnell Glacier
notes: Watching a glacier disappear in real time. Worth the climb.

name: Gannett Peak
notes: Wyoming's highest. Remote, glaciated, and earned.

name: Nikko, Japan
notes: Temples in the mountains. Sacred cedar forests. Where shoguns rest.

name: Adirondacks
notes: Old mountains, old forests. The original American wilderness.

name: Big Sur
notes: Where the mountains meet the sea. Henry Miller knew.

name: Pai, Thailand
notes: Mountain town in the north. Slow pace, good people, hot springs.

name: Bali
notes: Rice terraces, temples, and something in the air you can't name.

name: Leh, India
notes: High desert at the edge of the Himalayas. Thin air, thick presence.

name: Cappadocia, Turkey
notes: Fairy chimneys and underground cities. Landscape from another planet.

name: Barcelona
notes: Gaudi's city. Art, food, and the Mediterranean light.

name: Volcanoes National Park
notes: Pele's home. Where the earth is still being born.

name: Black Hills
notes: Sacred to the Lakota. Paha Sapa. The heart of everything that is.
